DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the long-term safety and efficacy of KAD-1229 as combination therapy with insulin in patients with type 2 Diabetes Mellitus who show inadequate glycemic control with diet, and insulin monotherapy, or insulin and oral hypoglycemic agent.
DOC.brief_title: Post-marketing Clinical Trial of KAD-1229 in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: Patients who has been receiving dietary therapy and a stable dose and regimen of insulin over 8 weeks before at the time of an observation term start Patients whose HbA1c at the time of an observation term start is 7.5% or more and less than 10.0% Type 1 Diabetes Mellitus Patients with serious diabetic complications and other serious complications
